description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.1M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Les Entreprises Fervel. The average
  contract duration was 3.87 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.0M. The longest
  contract was 6.17 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $8.9M.
